Mingjiao Great Master, Subject Faxian Respectfully Translated by Imperial Order At that time the World-Honored One said to Ä€nanda:
I observe that in the world, countless sentient beings
Often create evil karma and fall into the evil destinies.
After immeasurable time, they may escape.
Even if reborn as humans, their limbs may be incomplete.
Even if they are complete, they may have little merit and little wisdom.
They are always sought after by evil demons and evil spirits,
Who take advantage of them day and night to harass and harm them in various ways, causing them to be uneasy.
I have compassion for them and will speak the Balana Shava Great DhÄraá¹‡Ä« for them,
To ward off evil demons and evil spirits.
If there are sentient beings who hear this dhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
They should give rise to a sincere mind, uphold and recite it, make offerings and pay respect to it.
It will cause all evil demons and evil spirits to completely stay away.
disasters will be eliminated and there will be no epidemics.
Wherever one resides, it will be peaceful and joyful.ğŸ”½At that time, the World-Honored One then spoke the dharani, saying:

At that time, Ananda,
having heard the World-Honored One speak this dharani,
said, World-Honored One, please do not worry.
I will remember and spread it in the world,
causing all sentient beings to obtain great benefits.
Having said this, he immediately used the top of his head
to bow at the World-Honored One's feet, delighted and withdrew.
The Buddha Speaks the Great Dharani of Prana Shavari Sutra
